meanings.sent1: The teacher used an underscored marker to highlight the important points.
meanings.sent2: The underscored text stood out on the page.
meanings.sent3: The underscored message on the board made the students pay attention.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm underscored the importance of the project.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors underscored the beauty of the painting.

meanings.sent1: She underscored the key points in her presentation.
meanings.sent2: His actions underscored the urgency of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The comedian underscored the punchline with a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: The music underscored the emotional impact of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The spotlight underscored her talent on stage.

meanings.definition: A line drawn under a word or phrase for emphasis
meanings.sent1: The book had many important terms with an underscored line beneath them.
meanings.sent2: The underscored in the text helped the reader focus on key information.
meanings.sent3: The student added an underscored to the word to make it stand out.
meanings.sent4: The underscored under the title caught the reader's attention.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to find all the underscored in the paragraph.
